Package communication

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UDPPlusReceiver
    The UDPPlusReceiver is a protocol based on UDP, but is capable of correcting errors occurred during transmission when decoding a message which was sent over by UDPPlusTransmitter
    UDPPlusTransmitter
    The UDPPlusTransmitter is a protocol based on UDP, but is capable of encoding messages using the given FEC algorithms, which when an UDPPlusReceiver receives the message, will decode, and correct any errors occurred during transmission
